title: Finding Pride
description: Megan traveled a long way to start her new life, one that wouldn't include her brother. Losing him was tragic, especially since she was finally free from abuse and shame of a bad marriage.Todd was a man, who'd once lost it all, now he'd just lost his best friend & business partner.Breaking down Megan's barriers would take patience & strength, and he would need both to keep them safe.
author: Jill Sanders
